featured.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate interpretation of “ ” in the last paragraph? (A)
With a good ______ of both Chinese and English, Miss Lin was assigned the task of oral interpretation for the visiting American delegation.
The researchers believe that the elephants’ emotional reactions are due to their different interpretations of the smells and the sights.

definition.en_def: The act of explaining the meaning of something.
definition.example: Her interpretation of the poem revealed deeper themes.
